original_title: Neapolitan Dance at the Ancient Forum of Pompeii
overview: A folk dance staged in the ruins of Pompeii. With the Arch of Tiberius in the near distance and Arch of Caligula in far distance. A troop of soldiers, or possibly more performers, march past. W K L Dickson who is directing the action can apparently be seen on far right of picture.
title: Neapolitan Dance at the Ancient Forum of Pompeii
